CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK($User.ContactId)), /*Checking to make sure user account has a related contact*/ $User.ContactId = ContactId ), $User.Id = Submitter__r.Id, $User.Id = CreatedById, $User.Id = Owner:User.Id, $User.Id = Regional_Diplomat__c ), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: My Case
